cause.description:
The Big Brothers Big Sisters of NYC Race for the Kids sponsored by RBC Dain Rauscher is a 5k Run/Walk in Riverside Park to benefit the mentoring agency, Big Brothers Big Sisters of NYC. The event will also feature a fun 2k run/walk option for participants. Following the race, all participants are invited to a picnic with food, entertainment and games for everyone. Please join us on Saturday, September 29th!
1. every child deserves a chance to have their lives changed
2. The mission of BBBS of NYC is to provide mentors to underprivileged children who need a caring adult role model in their lives – special friends who can help to expand their horizons, realize their potential and enrich their futures.
3. visit my PERSONAL PAGE to register! go to the St.john's team page from here! http://raceforthekids.kintera.org/2007/missylovesthekids
